title: Create Comprehensive API Documentation and Client SDKs
body:
## Description
Document all API endpoints and create client SDKs for popular languages.

## Documentation Requirements
- OpenAPI 3.0 specification
- Interactive API explorer
- Authentication guide
- Rate limit documentation
- Webhook integration guide
- Example requests/responses

## SDK Languages
- Python (priority)
- JavaScript/TypeScript
- Go
- C# (.NET)
- Java

## Documentation Sections
1. Getting Started
2. Authentication
3. Core Resources
4. Webhooks
5. Errors
6. Rate Limits
7. Changelog

## SDK Features
- Type safety
- Automatic retry
- Error handling
- Pagination support
- Webhook helpers

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Complete OpenAPI spec
- [ ] Deployed documentation site
- [ ] Python SDK with tests
- [ ] JavaScript SDK with types
- [ ] SDK documentation
- [ ] Integration examples
